entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
